scripts.say: Eagle Union Mainland - NY City (Post-Siren attack)
Good winds, check. Calm waves, check. Today's looking like it'll be smooth sailing!
Yup. If nothing else, we'll have a nice journey on our way to the Canal Zone. We'll be busy after that though, because that stronghold isn't gonna protect itself!
Saratoga and I will have our hands full with a separate mission, so we won't be able to accompany you. Still, someone has to keep watch on our territories when our defenses are weak.
Don't you worry. If any Sirens show up, they'll get a welcoming present from my 8-inch guns.
You should start setting off now. Good luck out there, and stay on your guard.
Yeah, we ought to get going as well. Good luck, Enterprise, Saratoga.
It's no biggie, we're just checking out a remote stronghold! Anyhoo, safe travels to you all!
All righty, Sara's gonna go ahead and link up with the Commander~
I wonder how things are going up there in the Bering Sea. I heard they were going to investigate an iceberg fortress.
Think so... I think it's a bit suspicious how they invited the Commander out of the blue, when the Northern Parliament has been handling it by themselves so far.
So I want to be on the safe side and come along to ensure everything's fine!
In the meanwhile, you just need to hold the line here and await our triumphant return!
Roger that. Good luck, and give my regards to the Commander.
